Text: Kern River PricingI need you to assist me in repricing Kern River We are sending a package to the customer on Monday and will need to reprice the gas swap before we do so I am also attaching a spreadsheet which includes delivery location and monthly MMBTUs I would really appreciate it if you send me the model as well because the monthly volumes will change with different scenarios Call me if you have any questions Thanks Maria

Kern River Gas Price Cc Attached is the model we used to price gas for Kern River at the end of October As you can see we priced gas at two delivery points Pastoria and Opal I hope this is in any way useful to you if not we can discuss the delivery point with Knippa or Andrew when you come at am today Thanks and let me know if this is useful Maria

Kern RiverJohn Miles and Knippa just came back from visiting Kern River and gave me a new delivery point for this project We want to reprice the deal at OPAL I am attaching a small spreadsheet with a one year snapshot of monthly MMBtus for repricing it I would appreciate it if you send me the new gas price as soon as you get a chance Hope everything is going well Maria

Stagecoach Gas Swapneed to reprice Stagecoachs gas swap The location is TGP Zone I ve also attached the monthly MMBtus for one year Please let me know if you need me to provide additional information for repricing gas for this deal Thanks again Maria

Re Iroquois Swap ModelJohn I need to get an updated notional price for Iroquois We are sending an updated proposal to the customer next week so I will really appreciate it if you could send it to me as soon as you can Call me if you have any questions Maria Tefel Ps Please also forward your model to me because I have to run several scenarios in which the gas volumes vary Thanks John Griffith AM To Maria nron cc Subject Re Iroquois Swap Model Maria Here is the model Call with questions Once I again I want to remind you that these are still indicative Thanks John

Iroquois Term Sheetis the term sheet for Iroquois project compression services I would really appreciate it if you could please revise it one more time before I submit it to Mark Courtney Thanks for your time and please let me know if you have any questions Maria Tefel

Compression ServicesI need your assitance in finding the right legalregulatory group who could assist me with some regulatory issues necessary for completing a compression project I need to find if new loads in Brookfield Fairfield County CT pay Competitive Transition Assessment Charges The name of the project is Iroquois Eastchester Expansion and we are looking at CLPs Rate Number for power supplier I would really appreciate it if you could contact me in case you have a contact name Once again thanks for your time and efforts Maria Tefel Analyst Compression Services

Gallup Cc I work with Mark Knippa in Compression Services and we need your assitance for Gallup Project We just got access to a website which monitors load We need to revise the confidentiality agreement to specifically determine who can have access to this website I would appreciate it if you give me this information as soon as possible You can either call me at or sen me the information via email Thanks Maria Tefel

Bank Accounts Cc According to Carol Carter Co Enron Compression Services has a bank account from Hubbard and Bisti and Bloomfield I was looking through the Hubbard deal book dated March to find out about these bank accounts but unfortunately couldnt find any information We need your assitance in finding out if Co can take this bank account to make loans to Enron Corp Please let me know if you can assist us in finding this information Thanks Maria Tefel Compression Services

Stagecoach Cc We increased the heat rate from BtuHpHr to BtuHpHr I am forwarding the new volumes of gas based on this new heat rate PLease let me know if you have any questions Thanks Maria Tefel

Re StagecoachCharlie We received quotes from EES for different scenarios If we run just winter months at the following load factor January February March April May September October November and December the power cost is kwhrs On the other hand if we run year round including a load factor during the three summer months the power cost is kwhrs However there is no call option value reflected in this scenario EES is currently determining the call option value for the summer months Please also review the attached spreadsheet for expected running hours We are asumming that the compressor will run during the night pm to am when El Paso will be packing the line with gas Peak usage will occur as the line becomes more packed closer to the morning Curtailment call option available hours can take place during the peak hours of the day from am to pm Let me know if you have any other questions Maria

UNOCAL Gas pricing Info Cc Charlie Thanks for your time in meeting with us Attached is the information on Unocal The minimum required deliverable volumes are based on load factor and the put is based on above that volumes between a and a load factor Thanks and please call me if you have any questions Maria
Stagecoach Cc We increased the heat rate from BtuHpHr to BtuHpHr I am forwarding the new volumes of gas based on this new heat rate PLease let me know if you have any questions Thanks Maria Tefel
